workshop.controllers.internal.rest

Class WorkshopRestControllerAbstract<T extends WorkshopEntity>

  • java.lang.Object
    • workshop.controllers.internal.rest.WorkshopRestControllerAbstract<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - WorkshopEntity classType
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    WorkshopRestController<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AuthorityPermissionsRestController, ClassifiersRestController, DepartmentsRestController, EmployeesRestController, ExternalAuthoritiesRestController, InternalAuthoritiesRestController, OrdersRestController, PhonesRestController, PositionsRestController, TasksRestController, UsersRestController, WorkshopEntityTypesRestController

    @RestController
public abstract class WorkshopRestControllerAbstract<T extends WorkshopEntity>
extends java.lang.Object
implements WorkshopRestController<T>

    • Method Detail

      • getAll

        @GetMapping
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasPermission(#webRequest, \'get\')")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> getAll(@RequestParam(value="pageSize",required=false,defaultValue="${page.size.default}")
                                                                                                                                                  java.lang.Integer pageSize,
                                                                                                                                                  @RequestParam(value="pageNum",required=false,defaultValue="1")
                                                                                                                                                  java.lang.Integer pageNum,
                                                                                                                                                  @RequestParam(name="order-by",required=false,defaultValue="${default.orderBy}")
                                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String orderBy,
                                                                                                                                                  @RequestParam(name="order",required=false,defaultValue="${default.order}")
                                                                                                                                                  java.lang.String order,
                                                                                                                                                  @Nullable
                                                                                                                                                  org.springframework.web.context.request.WebRequest webRequest)
        Need to be overridden with PreAuthorize("hasPermission('#authentication, 'WorkshopEntitySimpleClassName', 'get')").
        Specified by:
        getAll in interface WorkshopRestController<T extends WorkshopEntity>
        Parameters:
        pageSize - @Nullable. Amount of WorkshopEntities on one page (at once). Default = DEFAULT_PAGE_SIZE.
        pageNum - @Nullable. Number of desires page. Default = 1. (!) Spring Page interface and WorkshopDaoAbstract accordingly both internally starts page count from 0 so to adapt it to more convenient count from 1 for the end Users we do '--pageNum' before passing it into domain logic and then '++pageNum' when returning pageNum back to the end User.
        orderBy - @Nullable The name of property the WorkshopEntities have to be ordered by. Default = DEFAULT_ORDER_BY
        order - @Nullable. 'asc' or 'desc' (ascending or descending) order. Default = DEFAULT_ORDER
        Returns:
        Paged and sorted WorkshopEntities collection with embedded navigation Links through it (i.e. prevPage, nextPage etc). Also every WorkshopEntity has its own self-link to be obtained as a HATEOAS resource.

      • postOne

        @PostMapping(consumes={"application/json;charset=UTF-8","multipart/form-data"})
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasPermission(#webRequest, \'post\')")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> postOne(@Validated(value=PersistenceValidation.class) @RequestBody
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        T workshopEntity,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        org.springframework.web.context.request.WebRequest webRequest)
        WorkshopEntity may contain some included WorkshopEntities without identifiers or 'identifier = 0' - they all will be treated as new ones and persisted in the DataBase. If any of them will throw an Exception during a persistence process - the whole WorkshopEntity won't be saved!
        Specified by:
        postOne in interface WorkshopRestController<T extends WorkshopEntity>
        Parameters:
        workshopEntity - WorkshopEntity object as JSON
        Returns:
        Either persisted WorkshopEntity as a HATEOAS resource with a self-obtainable Link and the 'identifier' (id) set or a HttpStatus error with its description.

      • getPageable

        public org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable getPageable(java.lang.Integer pageSize,
                                                            java.lang.Integer pageNum,
                                                            java.lang.String orderBy,
                                                            java.lang.String order)
        This method sets originally passed parameters to defaults if they are wrong so that they subsequently could be passed as valid data for getting Page
        Specified by:
        getPageable in interface WorkshopRestController<T extends WorkshopEntity>
        Parameters:
        pageSize - Will be set to default if it's <= 0
        pageNum - Spring Page interface internally starts pages count from 0 so to adapt it to more convenient count from 1 we do '--pageNum' to prepare Page and then '++pageNum' when return pageNum back to the end User. Will be set to default if it is wrong.
        orderBy - Property the collection will be ordered by. Will be set to default if it wrong.
        order - 'asc' or 'desc' Will be set to default if it's wrong.
        Returns:
        A current Page with the WorkshopEntities collection.
